page.title: 01REVIEW
page.content:
{Review}
Block 02880642 is a varied area incorporating both urban and rural features.The principal features of the area are the {town of Lanark }and { {the village of New Lanark}. Roughly half the area is covered by housing and places of employment. The rest of the area contains much pasture and arable land in what can be best described as a rolling landscape created by the last great glaciation.In the areas not covered by housing, there is a fair amount of mixed woodland,pine being the dominant species.Amenties are an important feature of this area;the main ones are the race course,several public parks and the golf course.Finally the river Clyde cuts across the bottom of the area.
